s.text: My worry about Bennett's lack of teaching experience struck me especially while reading the math section in The Educated Child . Bennett presents a perfectly reasonable sequence of math skills.

Math, he will soon discover, is far and away the favorite of a large number of kids--boys in particular, but that's another discussion.
